title: Looking for Dot Matrix kind of font
content:
I am looking for a font similar to Dot Matrix.   
But I need it to be more grid structured and   
with a larger dots.   
   
Any suggestions appreciated.   
   
serge
author: SergeZuev

comments.content:
POP from Neville Brody   
 [http://www.identifont.com/show?1DK](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013032828/http:/www.identifont.com/show?1DK)   
   
Cashier from ACME   
   
6X7Oct from We Work For Them   
   
Unda Circle from Identikal   
   
Genetrix Crossed (bitmap) from Atomic Media   
   
There are a couple of free ones ... trying to   
think of where...

thanks a lot bj!   
   
I am looking for a font with circle dots.
I'm unclear ... I think all those are circle dot faces. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013032828im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
